mapper.update: INSERT INTO reply (user_id, post_id, content, created_at) VALUES(#{userId}, #{postId}, #{content}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS 'reply_id', r.user_id AS 'reply_user_id', r.post_id AS 'reply_post_id', r.content AS 'reply_content', r.created_at AS 'reply_created_at', u.nickname AS 'reply_writer' FROM reply r LEFT OUTER JOIN user u ON u.id = r.user_id WHERE r.post_id = #{postId}
